oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc

Class OracleLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.store.Lock
      • oracle.pg.rdbms.index.jdbc.OracleLock

  • public class OracleLock
extends org.apache.lucene.store.Lock
    An Oracle extension of Apache Compass Lock to support locks over the Oracle JDBC directory when executing writing. This modification supports Apache Lucene 4.0 to date.
